sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* PDMC0020.SEARCH00.제작 견적서 -제작용 헤더 *//* [제작견적서 제작용 헤더] */ E.PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,E.PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,B.JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,B.JOBN_NAME /* 제작명 */ ,DECODE(E.ESTI_DATE,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),E.ESTI_DATE) AS ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,E.ESTI_AMTX /* 견적금액 */ ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.DEND_DATE,'') IS NULL THEN '미청구' ELSE '청구' END DEND_FLAG /* 청구구분 */ ,B.STAT_FLAG /* 제작상태 */ ,B.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ ,C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ ,B.DEND_DATE /* 청구일자 */ ,B.MEDA_CODE /* 제작종류 */ ,B.HIGH_LEVL /* 제작내용 */ ,B.USEX_TYPE /* 제작용도 */ ,B.REQU_DATE /* 의뢰일 */ ,B.COMP_DATE /* 완료희망일 */ ,CASE WHEN NVL(B.DEND_DATE,'') IS NULL THEN '견적미확정' ELSE '견적확정' END CONF_FLAG /* 제작확정구분 */ ,CASE WHEN NVL(E.JOBN_NUMB,'') IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CONF_YNGN /* 확정여부구분 */ FROM PD_ESTIMH A /* [제작견적서 제작용 헤더] */ RIGHT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_SUJUMH E ON B.JOBN_NUMB = E.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.PREE_CODE

SELECT /* PDMC0021.SEARCH01.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세 하단 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세] */ '0' CHK /* 선택 */ ,A.ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,A.PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,A.PREE_IDXX /* 견적순번 */ ,A.PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,A.ITEM_CODE /* 분류항목코드 */ ,B.HIGH_NAME /* 대분류명 */ ,B.MIDD_NAME /* 중분류명 */ ,B.SUBX_NAME /* 소분류명 제작항목 */ ,A.MEMO_FILD /* 내역 */ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /* 수량 */ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /* 단가 */ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /* 금액 */ ,A.DEND_AMTX /* 청구금액 */ ,A.OUTS_CODE /* 제작사코드 */ ,C.CUST_NAME /* 제작사명 */ ,A.SORT_ORDR /* 정렬순번 */ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.JOBN_NUMB = #JOBN_NUMB#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR, A.ITEM_CODE, A.PREE_IDXX
SELECT '1' || LPAD(CAST(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PREE_CODE,2,6)),0) AS NUMERIC) + 1,6,'0') FROM PD_SUJUMH WHERE 1=1 AND LENGTH(PREE_CODE) < 8
SELECT CAST(NVL(MAX(PREE_IDXX),0) AS NUMERIC) + 1 FROM PD_SUJUMD WHERE PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#

SELECT /* PDMC0020.PRINT00.제작 견적서 -제작용 헤더 *//* [제작견적서 제작용 헤더출력] */ A.PREE_CODE /* 견적번호 */ ,A.PREE_NAME /* 견적명 */ ,B.JOBN_NUMB /* 제작번호 */ ,B.JOBN_NAME /* 제작명 */ ,A.ESTI_DATE /* 견적일자 */ ,C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ ,B.JOBN_SIZE /* 규격*/ , F.OFFI_NAME AS HOME_NAME /* 농심기획 */ , F.ADDR_DESC AS HOME_ADDR /* 농심기획주소 */ , F.BSNS_NUMB /* 농심기획사업자번호 */ , F.OWNR_NAME AS HOME_OWNR /* 농심기획대표자 */ FROM PD_SUJUMH A /* [제작견적서 제작용 헤더] */ RIGHT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON B.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_OFFICE F ON F.ACCT_GUBN = '100' AND F.OFFI_GUBN ='1' WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE IS NOT NULL AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE# ORDER BY A.PREE_CODE

SELECT /* PDMC0020.PRINT01.제작 견적서 -견적용 상세 하단 *//* [제작견적서 견적용 상세 출력] */ '0' CHK /*선택*/ ,A.ESTI_DATE /*견적일자*/ ,A.PREE_NAME /*견적명*/ ,A.PREE_IDXX /*견적순번*/ ,A.PREE_CODE /*견적번호*/ ,A.JOBN_NUMB /*제작번호*/ ,A.ITEM_CODE /*분류항목코드*/ ,B.HIGH_NAME /*대분류명*/ ,B.MIDD_NAME /*중분류명*/ ,B.SUBX_NAME /*소분류명 제작항목*/ ,A.MEMO_FILD /*내역*/ ,A.TYPE_QTYX /*수량*/ ,A.ESTI_PRCE /*단가*/ ,A.ESTI_AMTX /*금액*/ ,A.OUTS_CODE /*제작사코드*/ ,C.CUST_NAME /*제작사명*/ ,A.SORT_ORDR /*정렬순번*/ FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.OUTS_CODE = C.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.PREE_CODE = #PREE_CODE#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDR, A.ITEM_CODE, A.PREE_CODE, A.PREE_IDXX
